duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct high content, fast paced local newscast and coordinate technical requirements with News and Engineering departments.
Assist News Producer with all technical aspects of newscast and direct specials and other programming as assigned.
Work as a team player in a pressure-filled environment and be able to work flexible hours/weekends/nights/early mornings/holidays.

education_certification.credential: At least 10 years major market directing experience at a commercial broadcast station or production facility.
